Body.Content:
If you’re an IT professional or decision maker, start using the newest Windows 11 capabilities with helpful tips and actionable steps summarized in one place. Read this month’s recap of improvements in Windows security, device and update management, Windows Server, productivity, and collaboration. Get started with the new Windows 365 features and offerings, security improvements, as well as solutions for specific scenarios in Windows Autopatch, Microsoft Intune, and app management, among others. Additionally, find preview opportunities for Windows Server 2025 hotpatching, the new Windows App, and other improvements released in August. 
 
When will this happen: 
All improvements summarized in this monthly recap are already available. 
 
How this will affect your organization: 
Whatever tools you use, you can start seeing improvements across various workflows in your organization with: 
  • Multifactor authentication (MFA) to sign in to the Azure portal, Microsoft Entra admin center, and Intune admin center 
  • New Windows 365 security features 
  • Solutions for specific scenarios in Windows Autopatch and Microsoft Intune 
  • WinGet 1.8 for app management 
  • New Windows App (in preview) 
  • Public preview of Windows Server 2025 hotpatching 
  • Other improvements released in August 
 
What you need to do to prepare: 
Read the new monthly recap and additional information to start benefiting from the latest improvements. 
 
Additional information: 
Read the monthly recap at Windows news you can use: August 2024. It includes highlights from the following channels: 
  • Windows 11, version 23H2 update history
  • Windows IT Pro Blog 
  • Windows OS Platform Blog 
  • Microsoft Intune Blog 
  • Windows Insider Blog

Title: Get started with August 2024 improvements in Windows 11
